metadata.name: Samsara
metadata.description:
Samsara (of the Intergalactic Whale)

We invite you to take this visual and auditory journey to explore themes of interconnectedness, ego dissolution, and the nature of reality!

Ponder on the mysteries of the universe while pushing the limits of your own consciousness and connect with the infinite beauty and complexity of the universe!

Celebrate the power of psychedelics and technology to expand our minds and transform our perceptions of the world around us!

Animation by [Nuwan Shilpa](https://nuwanshilpa.com/)

Music by [Whale](https://whale.cx/)
